items.title: Sources: Mendoza's brother to transfer from IU

items.title: NCAA golf champ joins LIV, forfeits Masters spot
items.description: Reigning NCAA men's golf champion Michael La Sasso has joined LIV Golf, forfeiting his chance to play in this year's Masters.
